item.title: 207: Bathroom Disasters & Porn Chat | Not For Radio
item.description: Podcast Description To send us a yarn or a voice memo - Click on the link below https://bitly.ws/YYGt Crook book with Jay. 3:11 - Dick drawings. 9:24 - Porn radio banter. 19:41 - Being beaten to the bathroom ends in disaster. 25:52 - Best names for cover bands. 29:34 - A classic stitch up on a night out. Give us a follow if you haven't already ~ Jay and Dunc.

item.title: 192: Johnny Stevens from Highly Suspect | Not For Radio
item.description: Podcast Description We were lucky enough to have Johnny Stevens, frontman for Highly Suspect, and the band's manager, Gregg, join us for a chat! Approximate interview timings: 1 - What do you make of being back in NZ/booking issues 4 - How Johnny got into music, ripping into the Backstreet boys 5 - All is still surreal for Johnny 6 - How Johnny met Rich and Ryan 7 - Beef with Ryan 7.
